gateway.title: Let's help you get started
gateway.description: Select your business type and we'll explain what information you'll need to complete this application.

alerts.description: Please ensure you make the correct selection before continuing. If you change this later, you may lose your saved progress.

checklist.title: Here is what you'll need
checklist.description: Below is a checklist of what you'll need on hand.

alerts.title: Ready to get started?
alerts.description: The application will take about 20 minutes. Your data will be saved as you go, so don't worry if you need to take a few breaks.

overview.title: Overview
overview.infoAlert: Complete steps in any order. Your data will be saved as you go.

countryOfResidence.description: Please select your current country of residence

industry.label: Business classification
industry.description: Select the classification that best matches the goods or services your customers will buy. Search by keyword (e.g. “automotive dealership”) or the North American Industry Classification System code (e.g. “123456”).
industry.placeholder: Search by keyword or NAICS code

countryOfFormation.label: Where is your business located?
countryOfFormation.description: Please select your country of registration

organizationName.label: Legal name of the company
organizationName.description: Please enter this exactly as it appears on your business registration documents

issuer.label: Issuing authority
issuer.description: Country where your ID was issued

organizationEmail.label: Company email address
organizationEmail.description: Provide the best email address to contact the business

website.description: Please provide a URL for your business

organizationDescription.label: Business description
organizationDescription.description: Please provide a summary of the products and services you offer to consumers. 1,000 characters maximum. Please don’t use special characters (e.g. * @ %, etc).

idValueDescriptions.EIN: A unique nine-digit number, assigned by the IRS, that identifies your company as a business operating in the United States.
idValueDescriptions.BUSINESS_REGISTRATION_ID: A unique ID assigned by the state or province where your business is registered.
idValueDescriptions.BUSINESS_NUMBER: A unique number assigned by the Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) to identify your business.
idValueDescriptions.BUSINESS_REGISTRATION_NUMBER: A unique number assigned by the state or province where your business is registered.
